text: At Bynder,

we provide a SaaS solution
for companies

to manage and maintain
their digital assets.
We moved to the cloud

very early on,
I think only the first day

our platform was running
in a kitchen,
underneath a kitchen table,

but as of the second day
we adopted AWS.

Amazon is one of the
first cloud providers
and also one of the biggest.

It helps us to provide a stable
platform across the world.

But next to that,
considering Amazon Bedrock,

we also recognize that 
AWS has

data isolation and
proprietary data
in their core values.

So we can also guarantee
our customers

that their data is not being used
to train new models.

Earlier, at the start of this year,
we adopted Amazon Bedrock,
and we recognized that using

Amazon Bedrock,
with Titan Multimodal Embeddings,
we were able to grow the usage

of our similarity search
for our customers tremendously.
And so that
gave one of our customers

the benefit of only having
to spend half an hour

to build their campaign
instead of two to three hours.

We definitely are looking for
more AI capabilities,

and we want to bring better
support for our customers.
